CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 2, 1957, page 19, reads: "The Speaker's Table... at the NAACP Human Rights Dinner including the above group of dignitaries. Left to right: The Hon. David L. Lawrence, Mrs. Daisy E. Lampkin, co-chairman of the dinner; Commissioner John Walker, Commissioner Howard Stewart, Roy Wilkins, guest speaker; Roland Sawyer, co-chairman of dinner, and the Rev. Charles Foggie, president of the Pittsburgh Chapter of NAACP. - 'Teenie' Harris Photo."David L. Lawrence was Mayor of the City of Pittsburgh 1946-1959, Governor of Pennsylvania 1959-1963, and he died in 1966.
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence, Daisy E. Lampkin, Commissioner John Walker, Commissioner Howard Stewart, Roy Wilkins, Roland Sawyer, and president of Pittsburgh Chapter of NAACP Rev. Charles Foggie, gathered around banquet table for NAACP Human Rights Dinner at Penn Sheraton Hotel with Jessie Vann in background
